name: Tiles and Dice
description:
Tiles and Dice is a puzzle game where you roll dice on a board to solve puzzles. All assets were created by us, including art and music.

Controls

Select Dice Group Click on Die Move Dice WASD Rotate Camera Q and E Undo Z Reset R
